name: Aperture (itch)
description:
This is far from my best work, however it's "not terrible" for only a few hours of development. This is what happens when you decide to make a platformer, only to realize that you hate making platformers, after spending 50 hours making one.

Game Jam 57 is redemption week :)

-----------------------------------------------

Controls 

Press W and S to go up and down in the tractor fields.

You have 3 lives

Lose a life by hitting landmines without your snow plow

Collect snow plows to plow through landmines for a short period of time and gain extra points
